info.name: Flickr WideScreen (Viewer) - FlickRiver v.7
info.description: ▶ WIDE style For Flickriver ▶ It's for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! Less Scrolling: Thumbnail fit your large screen... You can use it with: ▶Thumbnail Zoom Plus ▶Flickr PM : my TWEAK Script : Icons/new links for "flickr PM"
info.additionalInfo: WHAT IT do : For a less scrolling experience, it provide Smaller Thumbnails which fit All the screen: - Each row display 2x4 thumbs. - Show a Counter for each original row, so tou know where you are...... To use with: Thumbnail Zoom Plus Add compatibility with this addon (now you can preview the thumb on hover) : (Shows full image when you hover over a thumbnail.) > Change in v.7: - Auto loading work fine now.... =============== It's a part of my "Flickr WideScreen Collection". ▶ I rename my Flickr ALLinONE styles (because need more place - they are too heavy) - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE TOTAL (part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE TOTAL (part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey So, for a better result you need to install all of them. - For other good Flickr Viewers : ► Flickr WideScreen - FlickrHiveMind ► Flickr WideScreen - DACKR Viewer These Styles are better with this Useful Addon to preview thumbnail on hover: Thumbnail Zoom Plus For More information on Scripts and Addons that i use a lot with FLICKR: ► My BIG LIST - may 2012. (in Flickr Hacks discuss) ► Userscripts Group : "Flickr ★ Surf" (USO :8080)
